body_html:
I see the same issue outside of a Docker container, i.e. on my computer. The error message is quite long, and mentions several CUDA libraries, as in @CNugteren's example.

CUDA is properly installed and all necessary environment variables are set (CUDA_HOME, LD_LIBRARY_PATH). Installing e.g. Tensorflow 1.4.1 (and most likely prior versions) with exactly the same set up is no problem.

body:
I see the same issue outside of a Docker container, i.e. on my computer. The error message is quite long, and mentions several CUDA libraries, as in @CNugteren's example.

CUDA is properly installed and all necessary environment variables are set (CUDA_HOME, LD_LIBRARY_PATH). Installing e.g. Tensorflow 1.4.1 (and most likely prior versions) with exactly the same set up is no problem.
